title: Hydrological Model - GriddedVariable
description: This entity is a harmonized description of the variable of the gridded file.

type.description: Property. NGSI-LD Entity Type. It has to be GriddedVariable

maxLat.description: A number specifying the maximum latitude of the grid

maxLon.description: A number specifying the maximum longtitude of the grid

minLat.description: A number specifying the minimum latitude of the grid

minLon.description: A number specifying the minimum latitude of the grid

size.description: Three numbers, separated by commas, specifying the dimensions of the grid. The first value represents the time dimension, the second represents the latitude size, and the third represents the longitude size.

time_step.description: A character specifying the time step (temporal resolution) of the variable. Optional

spatialResolution.description: A number specifying the spatial resolution of the gridded data. Units: degrees or meters

fillValue.description: A number representing the fill value in case of missing data

missingValue.description: A number representing the fill value in case of missing data
